description_for_model: ChatGPT plugin allowing playlist creation and retrieval of the user's favourite tracks on Spotify.
description_for_human: Your personal AI DJ – build playlists, fetch your top tracks.

auth.scope: user-read-playback-state user-modify-playback-state user-read-currently-playing user-read-recently-played user-top-read playlist-read-private playlist-read-collaborative playlist-modify-public playlist-modify-private user-library-read user-library-modify user-follow-read user-follow-modify user-read-playback-position
